Hunter Survival Parka (for Female)
kDesc
Every successful Yeti Hunter needs lots of pockets. And you are VERY successful. [#Legal]
Tout chasseur de yétis accompli a besoin de beaucoup de poches. Et vous êtes TRÈS accompli. [#Legal]
Jeder erfolgreiche Yeti-Jäger braucht Unmengen von Taschen. Und du bist SEHR erfolgreich! [#Legal]
Ogni cacciatore di yeti di successo ha bisogno di molte tasche. E tu hai MOLTO successo. [#Legal]
Un buen cazador de yetis necesita muchos bolsillos. Y tú eres uno de los mejores. [#Legal]
*Not Localised* Female01_Torso_Yeti_Hunter [#Legal]
성공적인 설인 사냥꾼이라면 누구나 많은 주머니가 필요하죠. 그리고 당신은 매우 성공적이에요. [#Legal]
Every successful Yeti Hunter needs lots of pockets. And you are VERY successful. [#Legal]
每一個成功的雪人獵人需要大量口袋，而您非常成功。 [#Legal]
每一個成功的雪人獵人需要大量口袋，而您非常成功。 [#Legal]
Every successful Yeti Hunter needs lots of pockets. And you are VERY successful. [#Legal]
